There are four gods who rule this word,
Awmnis the Mighty, Hermega the Destructive,
Josh the Sleepy, and Wuhd the Fair.
Awmnis and Wuhd reside in Awmparadis,
while Harmega is sealed in heaven's tower
and Josh is sleeping beneath Wisconsin.
